acceptance-test-run.title: Podam cannot instantiate interfaces which extend Map
acceptance-test-run.name: podamCannotInstantiateInterfacesWhichExtendMap

test-step.description: Given a Custom Data Provider Strategy
Given a Podam Factory with external factory and custom data provider strategy
When I invoke Podam for a Generic Pojo specifying the concrete types
Then the object should be null
Then the collection should have exactly 1 elements
Then the two objects interface uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.MultipleInterfacesMapPojo and interface uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.MultipleInterfacesMapPojo should be equal
